info.author: Dipl.-Ing. Mustafa GÃ¶rmezer
info.description:
ServPDF is a webbased Microsoft Office to PDF Converter Server for Microsoft
Office and ServPDF-OO is the same for OpenOffice

Users can 
convert Office documents quickly from a webbrowser into PDF and PDF back to 
Postscript or Image formats. In combination with a Word macro hyperlinks,
headlines and more rich PDF features are possible.

The server application is based on Python Server 
Pages (spyce: from RimonBarr). It has all needed componends included in a single
installer and you can easily build up a PDF Server in only 20 seconds. All you
need is Windows 2000/XP with installed MS Office 2000/XP. Nothing more.

New: ServPDF can  convert PDFMarks, hyperlinks, and more
info.keywords: OpenOffice, PDF, Ghostscript, Postscript, Converter, Conversion, Server, Microsoft, Word, Excel, Powerpoint, webbased, Intranet
info.name: ServPDF-and-ServPDF-OO
info.summary: Web based Office to PDF Converter Server for Microsoft Office and OpenOffice
info.html_description:
ServPDF is a webbased Microsoft Office to PDF Converter Server for Microsoft Office and ServPDF-OO is the same for OpenOffice

Users can convert Office documents quickly from a webbrowser into PDF and PDF back to Postscript or Image formats. In combination with a Word macro hyperlinks, headlines and more rich PDF features are possible.

The server application is based on Python Server Pages (spyce: from RimonBarr). It has all needed componends included in a single installer and you can easily build up a PDF Server in only 20 seconds. All you need is Windows 2000/XP with installed MS Office 2000/XP. Nothing more.

New: ServPDF can convert PDFMarks, hyperlinks, and more
